Description:
Amed is comprised of many small fishing villages which hug the coast between the volcano which forms the eastern tip of Bali, and the sea. Surya Rainbow sits at the head of Amed and overlooks the beautiful Bali Sea towards Lombok. A short stroll will take you into the beautiful rice paddies or perhaps a long evening walk north along the beach or south around the point to Jemeluk Bay.

Try a free test dive in our pool with our PADI dive partners, Two Fish Diving. They offer a wide range of courses, boat outings or local diving on the local reef.

Enjoy the gentle ocean lapping at the shore of our personal beach, while you lounge by one of the biggest pools in all of Amed. We look forward to your stay. Just steps from Amed Beach, Surya Rainbow Villas provides simple but comfortable accommodation with free WiFi access. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a beachfront bistro restaurant and diving services.


It takes a 2.5-hour drive from the villa to Ngurah Rai International Airport. Tulamben is a 20-minute drive away with its famous dive spot of the famous USAT Liberty shipwreck. Tirta Gangga Water Palace is a 30-minute drive away. Surya Rainbow Villas also offers stunning views of Mt Agung, and the unforgettable Amed beachfront views.

The rooms at Surya Rainbow Villas are fully air conditioned and well equipped with a seating area and an en suite bathroom. Family rooms have TV with cable channels. Some rooms have a private patio offering views of the sea.

Guests can relax on the sun loungers that line the swimming pool and facing the beach. Diving is available with the in-house PADI dive instructors from Two Fish Divers.
